text: Coleothorpa mucorea is a species of case-bearing leaf beetles in the family Chrysomelidae. It has two subspecies. It is found in North America. ==Subspecies== * C. mucorea mucorea (J. L. LeConte, 1858) * C. mucorea schaefferi (Clavareau in Jacoby and Clavareau, 1907) ==References== Category:Clytrini Category:Beetles of North America Category:Beetles described in 1858
title: Coleothorpa mucorea
